statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} 3 \\ 0 \\ 3 \\ 3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 3 \\ -1 \\ -2 \\ -2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -21 \\ 2 \\ -11 \\ -11 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -2 \\ 0 \\ -2 \\ 0 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -4 \\ 0 \\ -4 \\ -6 \end{array}\right]\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
